title: Oprah on Negativity, Chris Brown vs. Chris Rock, Drake Donates 1 Million Dollars and more

description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show discusses Oprah and her views on negativity, Chris Brown vs. Chris Rock, Omarosa talks racism in the White House, Drake donates 1 Million Dollars and more.
